title: One on the Town
description: Guy Caballero welcomes you to SCTV's new programming season on NBC.

title: Polynesiantown
description: Johnny LaRue plays a restaurant owner in his latest movie.

title: Southside Fracas
description: Guy Caballero hires illegal immigrant Pirini Scleroso; the Fracases argue about their daughter's wedding.

title: Compilation
description: A selection of sketches from the previous seasons.

title: Lunchtime Street Beef
description: Johnny LaRue is desperate for work after the failure of "Polynesiantown."

title: Moral Majority
description: Guy tries to appease a major advertiser.

title: Pledge Week
description: SCTV holds a pledge drive.

title: Bouncin' Back to You with the Tubes
description: Lola Heatherton is despondent after her live special is canceled.

title: The Great White North
description: Bob and Doug McKenzie invite fellow hoser Ian Thomas onto their show.

title: CCCP 1
description: SCTV's regular programming is interrupted by a Soviet satellite.

title: I'm Taking My Own Head...
description: Libby Wolfson prepares for her new play.

title: Zontar
description: The SCTV cast and crew falls victim to alien mind control.

title: Walter Cronkite's Brain
description: David Brinkley's look at the human brain includes Walter Cronkite's childhood on Krypton.

title: Doorway to Hell
description: Guy runs out of ideas and takes suggestions from the crew.

title: The Godfather
description: A war erupts between the Five Networks when "Don Caballero" refuses to back a pay TV channel.

title: SCTV Staff Christmas Party
description: Johnny is forced to tape "Street Beef" outside on Christmas Eve.

title: Teacher's Pet
description: Ricardo Montalban is featured in a "To Sir, With Love" parody.

title: Midnight Video Special
description: Gerry Todd hosts a concert special consisting entirely of videos.

title: The Great White North Palace
description: Everyone is jealous of the attention Guy is paying to Bob and Doug--including giving them their own special.

title: Pre-Teen World Telethon
description: The kids of Pre-Teen World hold a telethon after their funding is cut.

title: People's Global Golden Choice Awards
description: When SCTV wins a suspicious number of awards, Bob Hope notifies the FBI.

title: 3D Stake from the Heart
description: Count Floyd takes us behind the scenes of the latest Coppola and Dr. Tongue production.

title: Pet Peeves/The Happy Wanderers
description: Hollywood stars reveal what bugs them; Stan and Yosh Schmenge welcome back a former Happy Wanderer.

title: Chariots of Eggs
description: Hall and Oates star in Bobby Bittman's latest film.

title: Battle of the PBS Stars
description: Carl Sagan's team takes on William F. Buckley's.

title: Rome, Italian Style
description: On the SCTV Foreign Film Festival, Angelo loses control of his fantasies.

title: Days of the Week, The/Street Beef
description: Everything comes to a head at Clay and Sue Ellen's wedding; Johnny meets a valuable ally at the bar.
